entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a character in the story, introduced as someone who makes guesses and has a dignified demeanor. She is described as having 'shawls' and 'many strands of glittering beads'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the person asking questions to Professor Trelawney, showing frustration at her inability to provide a clear answer.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney and Harry are interacting, with Professor Trelawney providing answers to Harry's questions.
